Verses: 1 mose Vaasasthalaththai Sthaabanampanni, Adhaiyum Adhin Ellaap Panimuttugalaiyum, Palipeedaththaiyum Adhin Ellaap Panimuttugalaiyum Abishegampanni, Parisuththappaduththi Mudiththanaalil,
2 thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsaththalaivarum, Ennappattavargalin Visaarippukku Vaikkappatta Koththirap Prabukkalumaagiya Isravelin Prabukkal Kaanikkaigalai Seluththinaargal.

3 thangal Kaanikkaiyaaga, Aaru Koondu Vandilgalaiyum, Pannirandu Maadugalaiyum Irandirandu Prabukkalukku Ovvoru Vandilum, Ovvoru Prabukku Ovvoru Maadumaaga, Karththarukku Seluththa Vaasasthalaththirku Munbaagak Konduvandhaargal.
4 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
5 nee Avargalidaththil Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Oozhiyaththirkaaga Avaigalai Vaangi, Leviyarukku Avaravar Velaikkuththakkavaigalaagap Pangittuk Kodu Endraar.
6 appozhudhu Mose Andha Vandilgalaiyum Maadugalaiyum Vaangi, Leviyarukkuk Koduththaan.
7 irandu Vandilgalaiyum Naangu Maadugalaiyum Kerson Puththirarukku, Avargal Velaikkuththakka Pangaagak Koduththaan.
8 naangu Vandilgalaiyum Ettu Maadugalaiyum Meraariyin Puththirarukku, Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaarar Iththaamaarudaiya Kaiyin Keezhirukkira Avargaludaiya Velaikkuththakka Pangaagak Koduththaan.
9 kokaaththin Puththirarukko Ondrum Kodukkavillai; Tholmel Sumappadhe Avargalukkuriya Parisuththa Sthalaththin Velaiyaayirundhadhu.
10 palipeedam Abishegampannappatta Naalile, Prabukkal Adhin Pradhishtaikkaagak Kaanikkaigalai Seluththi, Palipeedaththukku Munbaagath Thangal Kaanikkaigalaik Konduvandhaargal.
11 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Palipeedaththin Pradhishtaikkaaga, Ovvoru Prabuvum Thanthan Naalil Thanthan Kaanikkaiyai Seluththakkadavan Endraar.
12 appadiye Mudhalaam Naalil Than Kaanikkaiyai Seluththinavan Yoodhaa Koththiraththaanaagiya Amminadhaapin Kumaaran Nakason.

13 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaaga Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
14 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
15 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
16 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
17 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Amminadhaapin Kumaaranaagiya Nakasonin Kaanikkai.
18 irandaam Naalil Isakkaarin Prabuvaagiya Soovaarin Kumaaran Nedhaneyel Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

19 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
20 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
21 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Aattukkuttiyum,
22 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
23 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Soovaarin Kumaaranaagiya Nedhaneyelin Kaanikkai.
24 moondraam Naalil Elonin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaap Ennum Sepulon Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

25 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkalniraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
26 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
27 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
28 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
29 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Elonin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaapin Kaanikkai.
30 naangaam Naalil Sedheyoorin Kumaaranaagiya Elisoor Ennum Rooban Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai, Seluththinaan.

31 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
32 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
33 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
34 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
35 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Sedheyoorin Kumaaranaagiya Elisoorin Kaanikkai.
36 aindhaam Naalil Soorishadhaayin Kumaaranaagiya Seloomiyel Ennum Simiyon Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

37 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
38 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
39 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
40 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
41 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Soorishadhaayin Kumaaranaagiya Seloomiyelin Kaanikkai.
42 aaraam Naalil Thekuvelin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaasaap Ennum Kaadh Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

43 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
44 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
45 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
46 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
47 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Thekuvelin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaasaapin Kaanikkai.
48 ezhaam Naalil Ammiyoodhin Kumaaranaagiya Elishaamaa Ennum Eppraayeem Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

49 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
50 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
51 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
52 paavanivaarana Paliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
53 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Ammiyoodhin Kumaaranaagiya Elishaamaavin Kaanikkai.
54 ettaam Naalil Pedhaasoorin Kumaaranaagiya Kamaaliyel Ennum Manaase Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

55 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enney Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
56 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
57 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
58 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
59 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Pedhaasoorin Kumaaranaagiya Kamaaliyelin Kaanikkai.
60 onbadhaam Naalil Keedheyonin Kumaaranaagiya Apeedhaan Ennum Benyameen Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

61 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
62 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
63 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
64 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
65 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Keedheyonin Kumaaranaagiya Apeedhaanin Kaanikkai.
66 paththaam Naalil Ammishadhaayin Kumaaranaagiya Akiyeser Ennum Thaan Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

67 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
68 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
69 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
70 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
71 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Ammishadhaayin Kumaaranaagiya Akiyeserin Kaanikkai.
72 padhinoraam Naalil Ogiraanin Kumaaranaagiya Paakiyel Ennum Aaser Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

73 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
74 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
75 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Oru Aattukkuttiyum,
76 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
77 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Ogiraanin Kumaaranaagiya Paakiyelin Kaanikkai.
78 pannirandaam Naalil Enaanin Kumaaranaagiya Akeeraa Ennum Napthali Puththirarin Prabu Kaanikkai Seluththinaan.

79 avan Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Pojanapaliyaagap Padaikkumporuttu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Niraindhadhum, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkaaga Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyulladhumaana Oru Velliththaalamum, Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyulla Oru Vellikkalamum Aagiya Ivvirandum,
80 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Paththuchchekkal Niraiyulla Ponninaal Seydha Oru Thoobakarandiyum,
81 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavum, Oru Vayadhaana Aattukkuttiyum,
82 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavum,
83 samaadhaanapaliyaaga Irandu Maadugalum, Aindhu Aattukkadaakkalum, Aindhu Vellaattukkadaakkalum, Oru Vayadhaana Aindhu Aattukkuttigalume; Idhu Enaanin Kumaaranaagiya Akeeraavin Kaanikkai.
84 palipeedam Abishegampannappattapodhu, Isravel Prabukkalaal Seyyappatta Pradhishtaiyaavadhu Velliththaalangal Pannirandu, Vellikkalangal Pannirandu, Pon Thoobakarandigal Pannirandu.

85 ovvoru Velliththaalam Nootrumuppadhu Sekkal Niraiyum, Ovvoru Kalam Ezhubadhu Sekkal Niraiyumaaga, Indhap Paaththirangalin Velliyellaam Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkinpadi Irandaayiraththu Naanooru Sekkal Niraiyaayirundhadhu.

86 thoobavarkkam Niraindha Pon Thoobakarandigal Pannirandu, Ovvondru Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkinpadi Paththuchchekkal Niraiyaaga, Thoobakarandigalin Ponnellaam Nootrirubadhu Sekkal Niraiyaayirundhadhu.

87 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Seluththappatta Kaalaigalellaam Pannirandu, Aattukkadaakkal Pannirandu, Oru Vayadhaana Aattukkuttigal Pannirandu, Avaigalukkaduththa Pojanapaligalumkooda Seluththappattadhu; Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Seluththappatta Vellaattukkadaakkal Pannirandu.

88 samaadhaana Paliyaaga Seluththappatta Kaalaigalellaam Irubaththunaangu; Aattukkadaakkal Arubadhu, Vellaattukkadaakkal Arubadhu, Oru Vayadhaanaaattukkuttigal Arubadhu; Palipeedam Abishegampannappatta Pinbu Seyyappatta Adhin Pradhishtai Idhuve.

89 mose Dhevanode Pesumpadi Aasarippuk Koodaaraththirkul Pravesikkumpodhu, Thannode Pesugiravarin Saththam Saatchippettiyinmelulla Kirubaasanamaana Irandu Kerubeengalin Naduvilirundhundaagak Ketpaan; Ange Irundhu Avanode Pesuvaar.
